America's newest branch of the military is celebrating the end of its first year, and now its members will have something to call each other.  Say hello to the Space Force Guardians
For the first time in decades, the US has a new military service: Space Force is official with Trump’s signing of the National Defense Authorization Act.

Today, after a yearlong process that produced hundreds of submissions and research involving space professionals and members of the general public, we can finally share with you the name by which we will be known: Guardians.
